nodes.text: 1983 Topps Star Wars: Return of the Jedi Series 1
1983 Topps Star Wars: Return of the Jedi Series 1 was a trading card set released by Topps in 1983.

The set was based on Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, and featured stills from the film and promotional photos, all within a red and yellow border. The backs of the cards include character profiles and tell the story of the movie.
A sub-set of sticker cards were included, the backs of which included a portion of a larger image that could be pieced together with other cards like a puzzle.
